title: Circle of Zeit 6/8: Dan Bilzerian, Congressional Democrats, 38% of Americans, KPop Stans
itunes:title: Circle of Zeit 6/8: Dan Bilzerian, Congressional Democrats, 38% of Americans, KPop Stans
description:
On this edition of the Circle of Zeit Jack and Anna discuss Dan Bilzerian wrote an autobiography and it brought up some hilarious anecdotes, Congressional Democrats are wearing Kente garb in "solidarity with Black Lives Matter", a new poll shows 38% of Americans approve of Trumps COVID/Protest response, and KPop stans are flooding a Dallas snitch line with BTS memes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
